title: Biblical Warnings of Middle East War - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/23/18
itunes:title: Biblical Warnings of Middle East War - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/23/18
description:
George Noory and biblical scholar Mark Biltz discuss whether an upcoming lunar eclipse over the Middle East is a signal of a war that will bring upon End Times.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
